msIdentifier.msName: Will of John Sprint, Apothecary of Bristol, Gloucestershire

abstract.p: The last will and testament of John Sprint, Apothecary of Bristol, Gloucestershire.

div.p:
In the name of god amen I john Sprint
of the Cittie of Bristowe Appothicarie sick in bodye butt wholle of mynde thankes be to god therfore doe
make and ordeine this my last will and testament in manner and forme followinge In primis I bequeathe
my sowle to almightie god my saviour and redeemer And my bodye to be buried at the discreation of
my overseers Item I give to the cathedrall churche of Bristowe twoe shillinges six pence Item I give to the
poore fortie shillinges Item I give my house in Redcliffe strete wherein I now dwell to Joyce my wife
duringe her naturall life and after her decease to my sonne John and his heiers for ever Item I give
the Lease of my twoe tenementes next adiayninge to my saide dwellinge house to Joyce my wife for and
duringe so many yeares of my saide terme as she shall live And of the decease before thend of the saide
terme of years comprised in my saide Lease then the residue of my the said yeares to come in the saide twoe
tenementes shall remaine to my saide sonne John and his assignes to remaine in occupation to and withe
my saide dwellinge howse as longe as the saide terme of yeares shall continue Item I gibe unto my
sonne William and his heires forever all that my garden and garden grounde uppon Michell Hill
withe the Lodge in the same Item I give to Alice my daughter the rent goinge out of Barrs Lease
in the parishe of StSt James reserved uppon graunte by me made to George Baddram of the same Cittie marchaunte
Item I give unto my saide sonne John all my bookes of divinitie Item I
give unto my sonne William all my bookes of Lawe Cannon Lawe and roman Lawe Item all other
my bookes I give unto my saide sonns John and William to be equally devided betwene then Item
I give all my plate ( excepte the boles guilte and twoe tankerdes parcell guilte and a littell goblett
parcell guilte ) unto my saide wife and her assignes And I give the use and occupation of the
saide thre guilte boles and the saide twoe tankeres unto my saide wife for and duringe her naturall life and
after her decease my will is and I doe give and bequeathe unto my saide sonne John one guilte boule and
one of the saide tankardes parcell guilte And to my saide sonne William one other of my guilte boles
and theother tankard parcell guilte And to my daughter Alice the other guilt bole Item I give the
littell parcell guilte goblett to Thomas Sprint the sonne of my saide sonne William to be delivered
immediatly after my decease Item I give unto John Sprint the sonne of my said sonne John my
greate astrolebe of brasse and other instrumentes of astronimie withe my globes Item I hive to Ben
iamyn my sonnes sonne my signett of gowlde Item I give to Elizabethe Sprint and Constance
Sprint my sonne Johns dawghters to eache of them a feather bed withe his furniture after
my wives decease Item I give to Marie Strint dawghter to William Sprint a good table
clothe and a doosen of napkins All the rest of my goodes and chattels moveable and unmove
able I give and bequethe unto Joyce my wife whome I make my full and wholl executrix And
I doe constitute and appoynte my twoe sonnes John Sprinte and William Sprint my overseers
Written signed and sealed the fourthe of December Anno Domini a thousand five hundred eightie eight
Annoque Regni tricesimo primo in the presence of Thomas Callowhill. by me Thomas
Higgins / By me John Sprint.

Probatum fuit testamentum supra scriptum apud London coram venerabli viro
magistro Willelmo Drury Legum doctore
